xxl.core.spatial.converters
Class AsciiKPEConverter

java.lang.Object
  xxl.core.io.converters.Converter
      xxl.core.spatial.converters.AsciiKPEConverter
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class AsciiKPEConverter
extends Converter

An AsciiKPEConverter can be used to convert KPE-Objects that are stored in ASCII-format to a binary representation.

See Also:
KPE, Rectangle, Serialized Form

Method Detail

read

public java.lang.Object read(java.io.DataInput dataInput,
                             java.lang.Object object)
                      throws java.io.IOException
Reads an Object from the given DataInput. This implementation parses the input and assumes that the data is provided in lines containing string representations of 2*dim points. The points are separated by whitespaces. The first dim points are used to create the "lower-left" corner of a rectangle. The second dim points are used to create the "upper-right" corner of a rectangle.

Specified by:
read in class Converter
Parameters:
dataInput -
object - the Object for which attributes are to be read. If object==null this method should create a new Object;
Returns:
the Object that was 'filled' with data from the given DataInput is returned. This implementation returns a so called key-pointer-element (KPE) containing a Rectangle based on DoublePoints.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - in case of I/O Error
